text: Budet den', kogda On soberot vsekh ikh: "Sonm geniyev! Vy mnogogo trebovali ot etikh lyudey!" Pochitateli ikh iz etikh lyudey skazhut: "Gospodi nash! My, odni ot drugikh, poluchali vygody i yavlyayemsya pri opredelonnom dlya nas sroke, kakoy srok opredelil Ty dlya nas!" On skazhet: "Ogon' - zhilishche vam; v nom ostanetes' vechno, yesli drugogo chego ne zakhochet Bog". Istinno, Gospod' tvoy mudr, znayushchiy
